authorCommits.message:
Fix mobile field label text wrapping with responsive width classes (#3943)

* - Fix mobile field label text wrapping by using responsive width classes
- Change base width from w-48 to w-full for mobile-first approach
- Apply fixed widths (md:w-48/md:w-64) only for desktop inline layouts
- Stacked layouts now use w-full at all breakpoints
- Prevents long field names from wrapping on mobile devices

Fixes #2588

* rm trailing whitespace

---------

Co-authored-by: Paul Bob <69730720+Paul-Bob@users.noreply.github.com>
